releaseNotes:
Bug fixed that made app crash on start-up. 
Larger images supplied for larger phones
description:
Dr. Elaine Fogel Schneider, founder of TouchTime® International, is an internationally acclaimed author, therapist, trainer, and teacher. Her book, Massaging Your Baby–The Joy of TouchTime®-Effective Techniques for a Healthier, Happier, More Relaxed Child & Parent, was published by Square One Publishers, Garden City Park, New York and was translated into Chinese, and soon to be translated into Vietnamese and Malaysian languages. 

Dr. Elaine has provided care to thousands of children and families around the world. Her work has been featured in Parents Magazine, Massage Magazine, Child, Zero to Three, and on television’s The Learning Channel and Channel 11 News, and on websites www.ask.com, www.yahoo.vn.com, www.parentsconnect.com, and many others. 

Did you ever wish there was a “how to” manual that came with your baby that would tell you how to calm your baby, get your baby to sleep, or how to get your baby into Harvard? Whether you are a new parent, a seasoned pro, a grandparent, or caregiver, when it comes to finding an easy solution to your questions, Baby Massage Basics is your answer! 

•Do you want to be the best parent that you can be?
•Do you want to create a stable foundation for your child’s future?
•Is your baby fussy?
•Does your baby have colicky symptoms?
•Is your baby constipated?
•Does your baby have difficulty sleeping?
•Is your baby’s immune system run down? 

The answers to these questions, and more, lie within your own hands, and you won’t have to break the bank to enjoy these basic strategies. Now you can be the parent you always wanted to be because the perfect app has been developed just for you. The ABCs method that Baby Massage Basics provides, along with easy TouchTime® rhymes for use with body part strokes, will become second nature to you and your baby.

Baby Massage Basics comes with these great features:

•Four baby ethnicities to choose from.
•Six massage areas (Head & Face, Chest, Tummy, Legs & Feet, Arms & Hands, Back & Neck) with detailed massage techniques.
•Rhymes to sing to your baby for each massage area.
•Detailed information on preparing your baby for massage and the ABCs of massage.
•Specific information geared toward Constipated and Colicky babies.

Research shows how a nurturing touch will grow your baby’s brain, improve health and immune systems, and bring about happiness, harmony and calm for you and your baby.  Pain can be reduced, muscles can be stretched and toned, and after your baby learns to love massage, when older, your child will look forward to offering you a shoulder massage after a difficult day. The use of Dr. Elaine’s TouchTime® techniques will make you a better parent, companion, and create a parent-child bond that lasts a lifetime. Now what parent wouldn’t want that? “Start your relationship off on the right foot." Learn Baby Massage Basics and let the dance begin.

Dr. Schneider has presented her work for UNESCO, Zero to Three National Training Institute,  Association for International Child and Youth Care Practice, International Child Care and Caregivers Society, American Speech-Language and Hearing Association, The Governor’s Conference in California, and other conferences within the United States and around the world.  For further information contact drelaine@askdrelaine.com or visit her website at: www.askdrelaine.com. 

Thank you for considering this app. It will make a wonderful contribution to you and your family!
